This action allows users to log in, generating access and refresh tokens.

Parameters

Name Description
data *
object
(body)

Responses

Code Description
200

User Logged in sucessfully

{
message* string
title: Message
minLength: 1
error* string
title: Error
minLength: 1
data* {
userData* {
id
email*
firstName
lastName
gender
dateOfBirth
isContactVerified
isEmailVerified
profilePicture
socialLinks
learner
coordinator
instructor
phoneNumber*
 
}
accessToken* string
title: Access token
minLength: 1
refreshToken* string
title: Refresh token
minLength: 1
 
}
 
}
400

Bad Request

{
message* string
title: Message
minLength: 1
error* string
title: Error
minLength: 1
data* string
title: Data
minLength: 1
x-nullable: true
 
}
401

Incorrect username or password

{
message* string
title: Message
minLength: 1
error* string
title: Error
minLength: 1
data* string
title: Data
minLength: 1
x-nullable: true
 
}
